reviews.review_msg: Expect no feedback from her class. Normally a sessional instructor for Labour Studies. Hers notes are very repetitive, very disorganized, not what you should expect from an 100 level intro class  doesnt know how to use ppt lectures are such a mess Avoid her and Sarah at all costs!!!

Logan consistenly sped through all of his lectures, failed to explain most of the material. Didn't assign any textbooks. Was consistently late to upload materials and marks. Poorly facilitated class discussions, was uninformed on the material he was supposed to be "teaching". Doesn't have a grading rubric, grades you on vibes only. good luck!
Logan is great. I asked if he could bump up my grade and he did. Will take him again. Instructions were clear and modules were concise. Lots of readings to do.
Not much work for this course. Readings and Presentations. Typical online course. Logan kept the course going. Better face to face, I think.
